##### Definition
Let $Y$ and $X$ be two real-valued random variables. 

We say that $Y$ is **stochastically greater** than $X$ (denoted $Y\succeq X$) if for all $t\in \mathbb{R}$, $P(Y>t)\ge P(X>t)$.
